home.one_text_one: Hello! I'm a fullstack developer with a 3-year internship, and recently I've been intensively working on a SaaS product in the advertising industry (distribution and display). You could say I'm really good at creating scalable and truly efficient web applications. Now I'm looking for a place where I can jump into deep water and fully develop my wings in MERN technologies (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js).
home.one_text_two: Goal? Working on innovative projects that really make sense and where I can contribute to creating something cool and effective. I'm ready for new challenges! I'd be happy to join a team that values good work and gives space for growth.

two_text.header_one_text: I love strategic thinking and predicting several moves ahead in chess. My favorite opening is the King's Indian Defense.
